title: Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet) on voided satin ground
description: Ciselé velvet in orange cut and uncut velvet. Ground in uncut pile. Figure of small round flowers in cut pile. Curving zigzag lines and also buds of flowers, voided in satin ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 18th century.Medium: silk
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet) on voided satin ground. 1896-2-51.
